html:
11.8.18  1:49 am   Do you consider yourself more of an optimistic or pessimistic person?

     some what

11.8.18  1:29 am   will you eventually expand the improv and reality sections?

     oh heck yeah

11.8.18  1:09 am   what does r m and p stand for on the anagrams page

     requested, made, posted

11.8.18  12:29 am   i know that a lot of your songs such as we could just get high or got to know what's going on were written or partially written long before you released them. is the same true of your newer songs and if it is,

     some of them, but i've been writing more recently now that i've started recording more songs quicker

     when did you start on them? (particularly interested in hello sexy pants,

     started 11.2.10 (first 8 bars only, and it was different). then transformed on 2.9.13 into the current version (still only first 8 bars). the rest was written in late april/early may 2018

      best friends with my own front door,

     written entirely 8.23.18 and 8.24.18

      and mount st helens is about to blow up)

     first few lines on 9.6.18, and finished 9.9.18

11.8.18  12:09 am   Bill, I've been feeling a huge pile of nothing and a huge pile of everything at the same time. Or probably not. I dont know. What do you do to make yourself happy, or less miserable?

     move, change, or turn a bit

11.8.18  12:07 am   has anything anyone asked you here ever ended up in one of your songs somehow?

     sort of but not really

11.8.18  12:06 am   If you had to make a video about a long long journey would you do it?

     i think i did

11.8.18  12:02 am   do you have any tips for cutting onions?

     https://youtu.be/WyyEc-GNDfQ?t=2m45s

     sure

     it is a gift from god

     they will

     yes

     westminster quarters

     probably not

     practice with a friend? do simpler ones? maybe there are some sites that can give you some really simple ones

11.7.18  8:34 pm   how are you doing tody

     good

11.7.18  7:49 pm   If you got a record deal would you take it

     it depends on the terms

11.7.18  6:52 pm   your last song was really bouncy did you do that on purpose

     yes

11.7.18  5:50 pm   how to change a flat tire

     see if you can flatten it more

11.7.18  5:38 pm   what in your opinon is the best first instrument for someone who knows nothing about music?

     maybe some type of piano keyboard

11.7.18  5:24 pm   What is the one thing I should start doing different... starting tomorrow morning?

     start doing things today instead of tomorrow

11.7.18  3:19 pm   What are some things that are okay to do occasionally but definitely not okay to do every day?

     get married, get divorced, win the lottery, lose the lottery

11.7.18  2:12 pm   Is this theory correct? Long long long journey tells the story of three people. The first one had a dream that was broken, and decided to live in the woods and be spiritual. The second one wanted to be an artist but was not feeling very happy with their life. This is why you say MOST of them were painted by somebody else. They decided to become a movie director and found success. The third person was a musician tha has amnesia and gives information to their family subliminally through music. The chorus links them all together and shows how we can change our lives in order to be happy, and enjoy the long long long journey of life.

     the only thing that can prove or disprove this theory is science, and the scientific method

11.7.18  1:52 pm   what do you think about me capitalizing the first letter of a word to emphasize it? like, instead of "i learned a LOT", i'll type "i learned a Lot", because i don't like looking at completely capitalized words.

     that's the same thing i usually do

11.7.18  1:46 pm   What's your opinion on this "Flat Earth" thing?

     hoax. not a hoax that the earth is flat, the earth is not flat, hoax not necessary. it's a hoax that there was a hoax. no one ever thought the earth was flat except for maybe 1 guy who could have been paid by those orchestrating the flat earther hoax

11.7.18  12:28 pm   how do elevators work?

     a delicate mixture of gravity and anti-gravity

11.7.18  11:26 am   help how to do get back to the main page from here

     impossible

11.7.18  11:13 am   When you write a song, do you usually start by writing it as sheet music, or by playing something you like and then notating it, or something else entirely?

     nowadays i don't normally use notation, because audio recording is readily available everywhere. just demo how it goes, briefly explain what and where it is, and file it accordingly

11.7.18  11:08 am   slow down

     i will not

11.7.18  10:23 am   What kind of machines do you think would be nice to build?

     person

11.7.18  9:56 am   What if you got a hater shield so you could answer questions that you couldn't normally due to haters?

     i am getting one soon

11.7.18  9:10 am   How do you create such unintentionally good memes?

     i do it intentionally

11.7.18  9:00 am   what is your favorite kind of sandwich?

     pepper

11.7.18  8:33 am   have you considered making parts of your song less meaningful to make the other parts stand out more? I think that's how some people do it.

     yes i do that

11.7.18  8:17 am   So a few weeks ago you were wondering if it was better to have the song available before or after the music video was uploaded, because due to all sorts of shenanigans from music provider, having both be released at the same time was impossible. Since the last song was also available before the video, does that mean you picked "before"?

     reluctantly yes. as i said i would prefer at the same time

      Follow-up question, do you know that the song video automatically generated by youtube is region locked such that we can only listen to your new song if it's passed midnight in our timezone? Would you be willing to release the song directly on your website at the same time as that song video is generated? That way we could all enjoy your new song at the same time regardless of local time, instead of having to do through silly lengths to bypass the region lock.

     that is earlier than i would prefer the song to be available

11.7.18  6:33 am   is there just 1 coast guard? or are there several and they each take turns?

     1 per house hold

11.7.18  6:30 am   if there is an Internet, is there also an Outernet? 

     no

11.7.18  6:25 am   what's your total playtime on countdown timer?

     sorry i made a mistake, the name of the game is audio countdown, and i must have played about 65 hours

     no

      if yes, give us an exemple

11.7.18  5:26 am   What is your stance on bricks?

     layered

11.7.18  2:14 am   How do I stop trying to impress people to make them like me?

     start thinking about whether they impress you enough, for you to like them

11.7.18  2:12 am   why do you make weird videos

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

11.7.18  2:12 am   whats your favorite pet

     a jet

     i will not

11.7.18  1:36 am   Why did Germany's most famous mustache model kill himself?

     mustache anxiety

11.7.18  12:37 am   hey bill, how do you stop yourself from writing about something too often? i've gotten into songwriting recently but i keep finding myself writing songs about this guy that hurt me a while back even though i've mostly moved on.  i am a bit bitter about things i never got to say but i know there's no opportunity to say it now.  how did you stop yourself from mentioning concepts like going home in your songs when you felt it got repetitive? thanks if you do respond 

     i recently got an electric shock device which helps

11.6.18  11:25 pm   what do you think is the best way to overcome fear and doubt?

     find new fears and doubts which are more significant than the previous ones

11.6.18  10:45 pm   I am about to go on a long long journey away from my home to a completely new place across an entire ocean. How should I find new people for friendship?

     you won't quite know until you get there

11.6.18  10:25 pm   As someone who wants to get into learning and making music what is best advice you could give me?

     no need to wait! go ahead and right into it

11.6.18  10:15 pm   why is "15 minutes" called precursor.mp3? Precursor to what?

     when i can say what i'm trying to, i suppose
